channel.title: Church for Entrepreneurs
channel.itunes:summary: This is your spiritual dojo for Word Training, so you can fight the good fight of Faith to conquer the mountain of your God given entrepreneurial calling.
channel.itunes:author: Amos Johnson Jr, PhD

item.title: “God is going to work it out” is not a strategy for success [Archive]
item.description:
We on a brief break, so I don't have a brand new podcast for you this morning.

However, I went through the archive and pull out one that will give you some insight on the balance between Faith and Planning.

This podcast is titled: "God is going to work it out” is not a strategy for success.

item.title: Don't ask why, just keep pressing until victory
item.description:
Have you ever heard the saying "the Lord gives and takes away". Well, it's in the Bible, but this is not true. We use this saying to make ourselves feel better when things don't work out the way we desire.

Instead, when you know it is God's will for a thing to happen, then don't except the disappoint and don't ask why it didn't happened. Just ask God to fix it and keep pressing until you have victory in that area.

Learn more about this concept in today's podcast.

.
